content.detailedDescription: The event began a few days prior to the live webcam experience at which time browsing through your website i noticed that in the month of september there were a number of ufo sightings in the great lake area. this prompted me to limit my live webcam search to the great lake area specifically lake huron whose live webcam located on the shores of the city of lexington of michigan gave me a clear view of the lake. that sunday afternoon 4:30 in clarksville and 5:30 pm in lexington, mi the  weather forecast for that area was clear with sunny skies with a reported temperature of 70 degrees. like all live webcam cameras this one would refresh every few minutes which showed clear skies and it was in one of those refresh frames that i spotted a white object around the 1 or 2 o'clock position on the image. my first thought that came into mind that was a bird or a plane that was photographed by the camera. needless to say, i opted to save the image into "my pictures" window media and using the zoom tool it immediately became obvious to me that the white object in the image was not a bird nor of a plane. it appeared to me that this white object had a saucer disc with a faint shadow on the bottom of the object. i am not sure what it is and for this reason i respectively submitt this report for your analysis. attached is the original downloaded image.
content.summary: Live web cam overlooking great lakes-lake huron

content.detailedDescription:
It was 8.05 pm when i was outside with my friend nex house sitting and smoking when my friend told me look this plane it s not suppose to pass this way.Cause we are just by the airport amd the runaway go to est-west and no airplane can cross north south or south north it s forbidden.
this with light was very bright all around and under not just on the front.
we noticed it was moving from nw sky headind se. it was moving at a steady pace and past just over the fort lauderdale airport and crossing the runaway
at maybe around 4 or 5000 feet in a steady slow motion size of the object was almost about half size of a regular commercial air line plane.
no noise no green light no red light no withe strobe.
someting strange there s normaly always many airplanes around that we can see
but during all the time about 3 minutes that this object was passing
there was no airplane around son after this object reach this ocean
we can see many airplane star to come around again.
it was like if they were advise to not come around during the object was passing.

thanks for reading.
jack scott
content.summary: White sphare or light ball very bright over fort lauderdale airport

content.detailedDescription: Look
content.summary: look

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving south to cape cod. my friend was directly behind me on rt. 3 just outside of plymouth ma. the sky was gorgeous and clear. i noticed the craft (as described above)at the 1 o'clock position and watched it for a few minutes as it was stationary. i knew it was not a plane from previous experience. i then called my friend on my cell phone to ask if she could see it and agreed it was really there. i continued driving and it blinked out but then showed up again at the 11 o'clock position and only for about a minute and then was gone. my friend witnessed this also and it was her first sighting.

i was on vacation and away from computers or i would have written sooner.  i spent 52 years in my homestate of colorado with my last residence in the san luis valley.  i did witness 3 seperate craft events and had different people with me to validate those sightings. i also found a mutilated cow outside of hooper in 1996-'97(?) and reported it to chris o'brien. one of my photos is on his site.

i was very excited to witness this craft here in ma. all previous 3 sightings were disc shaped and this one was different.
content.summary: Bright silvery-bronze oval shaped craft  (not a disc).

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my front yard watching my dog do her business when i noticed a moving object in the nnw sky.  it was moving at a steady pace but what caught my eye was its brightness - sort of a yellowish orange color and not an airplane.  it was moving sse in a steady slow motion.  it was so odd that i had my wife and adult daughter come outside to view the object.  it moved very steadily slightly east of the planet visible in the southern sky which was east of the crescent moon.  the brightness, color and size of the object was almost identical to the planet (not sure which one that is this time of year).  it went out of site into trees in the sse horizion.

i have done a lot of flying in commercial airplanes and have enjoyed star gazing / looking through telescopes for many years and have never seen anything like this.  did i see an orbiting sattelite of the space shuttle perhaps.  it was vey weird!
content.summary: Looked exactly like the planet visible in the southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was cigar shapedto start and then either turned so that it changed shapes or it actuallly changed shapes. it was about 30.000 feet and was red and yellow in color and was in the ne sky
content.summary: It hovered in the same spot for over an hour and changed colors twice

content.detailedDescription:
this ufo was seeing first by my son andrew whom in turn call my wife yolanda and i (edgardo) to see it. it seems like each one of us saw something similar. 

andrew's  account:                                                              
"a group of starlike objects followed by one large red colored amorphous appearing object. all objects moved across the sky as one then the starlike objects stopped and began moving in different directions" 
 

yolanda's account:
when my son called us, we run to the door and he pointed at the sky, asking: do you see that: what is it? and i saw some bright lights, that i first thought were stars, but soon realized they were moving very fast in a north-east direcction, and behind them was this huge red "blob", with an amorphous shape, moving and then seemed to stop right above us, still changing shapes constantly, then the bright lights in front of the "blob" for a moment only, seemed to start dancing around it, then, disapeared on top of the roof, continuing in ne direcction. the "blob" was red, not bright but it seemed to have its own light, and there were more lights inside it, also not so bright, but we could clearly see them. then the "blob" disapeared in the same direction of the lights. i rushed to the kitchen window at the other side of the house but i did not see the bright lights or the blob anymore. i think we watched this for 90 seconds or so.

edgardo's account:
last saturday night, in san pedro california and around 8;15pm. my son,my wife and i saw several groups of lights traveling northbound(only my son saw that), when my wife and i came out the front door the movement was eastward. 
the main or the largest group was an amorphous figure that look like a transparent net with about seven not so bright red octagonal pieces trapped inside and moving around the net thus making  continuous changes to the shape of the figure.It was pretty and geometrical.

the other groups were more like single lights following the big medusa described above.
content.summary: Group of red lights in the sky moving first northbound and  then eastward.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was stargazing and noticed a bright white light coming out of nw.  used big dipper as a reference point. object suddenly shot up at a 90 degree angle.  was out of sight in a few seconds.

this information was relayed to me over the phone by the witness.  he stated that he did not have internet access so i took the report.  

lisa behr, dispatch operator
content.summary: Stargazing saw bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was out infront of my house with my boyfriend a friend and my 11 year old son. my boyfriend went to the backyard and i heard him saying something but i was talking to my friend and didnt hear him until he came back. he said..There is something weird in the sky. i saw it. i thought it was the northstar but i saw the north star to the left of the object. it moved as fast as an airplane but seemed to move smoother. it turned from white to brown/red. it made no noise. it had no blinking. it disappeared when i blinked my eye. i wish i had a camera or video tape.
content.summary: Looked like the north start but it moved.. it turned from white to dark brownred..Disappeared very quickly

content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my friends house when i see low red light real bright.The light seem to turn white and desended away.Then it happen from the side of my friends house it wasn' close it was kind of far.Then it went white in started to go little.It started flashing and then disappeared.Then a whie light was flying over my head that also dissaperaed.The red light appeared on the other side of the house trice. i seen planes and helicopters fly by. it was one the sites i seen there has been a lot  and they should be investigated . ihave 8 eyewitnesses that were with me. i wish you would call me.I have know picture but i will keep looking and reporting.
content.shape: Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Unknown
content.summary: It was a about four of them maybe even five red orbs who flashes brightly.

content.detailedDescription: I walked onto my balcony, saw a white object approaching. i had seen this object in the past speeding eratically acros the sky. i grabbed my camera and saw it morph into a plane. i took two images on my digital camera before it went behind the trees. when i looked at my camera, i noticed that my dates and settings had changed, even on the image properties. www.Ascensionfiles.Com.
content.summary: White object morphs into unmarked white airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen since february of this year on several different occasions strange unidentified objects in the sky at the end of dusk and night. the last occurring 22nd of september. i reported the first object seen to the sheriffs department via the phone. i did not report any of the events after since the first time there was no action taken or any alertness raised by the call. i drew pictures and described the events and dates so i would not forget any important detail to the strange things i have seen. a lot of activity has been happening you need nothing more than wait and watch. they don't appear so frequent or come on specific times to which you can expect them on any given evening. i have had 5 sighting in the last 9 months and each one have been spectacular and defy any knowledge i have a human aviation. the crazy thing about it is i have this internal belief like a subliminal message that they want me to notice them when i see these objects. one more point that i may have failed to mention is that no 2 events have ever been the same they always appear as something different as far as craft type.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiples

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friends were sitting when many heelicopters were over are house.
red orbs were like flashing then would burn out the move then disapear. it happened in three different places. i have five witnesses
content.summary: Red with flash and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: me and my wife were on our way to my parents house. driving south, i noticed a bright red light motionless in the sky. i pointed it out to my wife, who also seen the object. it took approximately ten minutes to drive to my parents, and we visited for roughly a half an hour. leaving their house, i noticed the object was still visible, and in the same location. i decided that if it was still there by the time we got home, i would take my camera and try to get a photo. arriving home, i ran into the house and grabbed my camera. by this time the object had been in the sky, and in the same location about fifty minutes. i drove west, to a grocery store parking lot, and snapped a couple of photos. i could only get two, because the clouds were rolling in. the photos show what i seen, a bright red light. i have tried to zoom in on the photos, but cannot make out a solid shape. this could just be some sort of light reflecting off of something, i don't know. i would be interested in your opinion.
content.summary: Noticed a red triangular object in the sky, nnw.  it was motionless for at least an hour.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog this morning down the street,i glanced up and saw a boomerang shaped craft,60 or 70 feet,wingtip to wingtip,about 150 ft over head.It was gliding,no noise,it seemed to pause for a few secs and then glided off.My dog barked at it.It also seemed to reflect the area below it.I was amazed.Thats all.I live on the intercoastal waterway,if that matters.
content.summary: Walking down street,dark,glanced up and there it was ,gliding 150 ft over my head

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on us 101 and looked over towards the sfo airport area and a shiny reflective object caught my eye. after several takes, it was a donut shaped metallic object that was tilting left and then right while rotating. as i was moving i couldn't tell if it was moving too but it seemed to be hovering. it was high up in the sky but not too high as i was able to see it's shape (donut) and movement very clearly. 

i couldn't watch it for long as i was on a highway but it was definitely there. possibly it was a kite or something man made but since it was right next to sfo i'm assuming that wouldn't be allowed due to clearance issues. i contacted sfo airport with inquiries but i didn't receive any response.
content.summary: Donut shaped metallic ufo over sfo airport

content.detailedDescription: This evening i was returning from my evening walk along a country road hear in the mountains (2400'), when i happened to look up at the moon and jupiter (i believe) and saw a star-like object move silently and steadily southeast for around 30 seconds until it started to go behind the tree-line, at which time i ran down the road and got a few more seconds view. when i first saw it, it was near the moon and proceeded to go between the moon and jupiter. there was no flashing or change of course and it had almost the luminosity of jupiter. the color was very close to that of jupiter as well. i watch the sky often and am very familiar with satellites, planes, etc. and this immediately struck me as something i have never seen before. my wife and child were with me and saw this as well.
content.summary: Star-like moving south-east

content.detailedDescription: Okay so the second one this year... crazy. i was in bed and about to go to sleep when my cat bothered me to feed her. so i got up and fed the cat, and went outside for a smoke. almost as soon as i lit my cigarette i looked up at the stars and noticed one was moving. it looked as though it were a star at first then i noticed an oblong shape to it. i carefully watched to see if there were any flashing lights on it but there were none. i listened for it, but there was no sound whatsoever. i watched for a few seconds as it headed south. it couldv'e been anything... was my initial response, there was nothing special about it, until it kind of veered to the right, then backwards and then back on course. freaky. if you ask me, whatever these things may be know more than we do. i swear each time i have wittnessed this occurence it was almost as though they saw me looking and wanted to make their presence known by manuevering in some odd manner. my heart raced as i watch this phenomenon, but something in me told me that everything was okay. crazy crazy crazy, thats all i can say. the funny thing is that this object flew very near, if not right over a major airport near me, they had to have seen something. i was unable to get any photos, even if i had a camera it was way to far to pick it up.
content.summary: Unknown object moving through nightime sky

content.detailedDescription: 2 witnesses saw an object very high in the sky traveling very fast from south to north. the object made no sound and displayed a light cycle of gradual illumination (the entire object was glowing white when illuminated) for about 3 seconds and then a gradual fade to complete black for exactly 5 seconds. sighting time was just a little over a minute or so, but it's the second one i've seen like this since july. the object made no sound and flashed this time, but only once during the whole sighting.
content.summary: Silent ufo displaying continuous light cycle of 3 seconds of illumination followed by 5 seconds of blackout

content.detailedDescription: This was on the last day of school may 1984.My parents had spent the week packing the travel trailer to go to san diego to help out my  grand parents.So my brother and i decided to ride our dirt bikes and were going through the check list of things we both asked of each other.I had to stay cause of summer school and i hoped of spending the fourth through the rest of the summer in california.So we started south on lovelake rd. and croseed the cattle guard between our land and ralph h. jr and leonard m. property(the road was gravel back then).We saw ralph in his apple tree orchard and tending to his potatos that he had tried to grow that summer.All of a sudden i got a real creepy feeling worse than the ghosts i've encountered and i had gone from feeling great that vacation had started to dread like i was going to die.I looked up the road and down and saw no cars and i stopped my brother and we sat their on our bikes for a while looking around, when i spotted a cigar shaped object a mile away and about a thousand feet to a thousand five hundred in the air.We thought it was a plane or jet liner but after ten minutes it was not getting any closer and now we could detect heat waves coming off of it whenever it moved left to right or went up or down i told my brother i thought it was a u.F.O. he watched for a while before saying he agreed.Our neighbor ralph looked where we were looking and watched for a while and yelled at us that he thought it was a plane.We ignored him and what he said cause now about twnety minutes elapsed and the damn thing still was bearly moving from it's original position.At this time i really had a sick feeling to my stomach but i could not stop watching it.It was about four-thirty then and a jet liner was approaching from the east and heading west and the skies were clear and no wind.It suddenly disappeared i looked south toward the white mountains toward sunrise which is visible from our house.I spotted what seemed to be a rectangeler mirror reflecting the sun light.Once the jet liner had cleared the area the object returned,by now i estimated the size to be about thirty feet in diameter and about twelve to fifteen feet thick and was a dark gray (it looked like two saucers put lip to lip)but when it would shoot off it looked like it was reflecting the sun light.It started to go up and down and circle some place i would guess was east of snowflake.Now a small plane approached from the west from the taylor airport (about the same height as the object and heading toward st. johns)) once again the object shot off (i never did see it till it was over sunrise where it seemed to be brighter) once the small plane was gone it returned and continued in that same pattern for the next hour.At about five-thirty we headed to the house and told my mom who got a friend to bring the binoculars and we watched as a jet liner appeared from the east again and the u.F.O. silently followed it while gaining altitude up behind it and followeed it into a dark cloud the jet liner emerged but the saucer did not.All the grown ups involved in this said it was a plane but they did not watch it like me and my brother for two hours.Plus the bad vibe i got from this thing was real bad.It's still is the most amazing thing i've ever seen! my father arrived about five minutes later and he usually arrived home at six p.M..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daylight sighting near taylor, arizona.

content.detailedDescription: Driving up 5th street in oregon city i saw five round, glowing orange lights. my friend was driving in front of me and she pulled over. i assumed she saw them too so i pulled over behind her. we both got out of our cars but when we looked up they were gone. i mentioned it to a friend who thought we were crazy but later called me back to inform me that she had received a call from her sister in-law who reported seeing the same things. what i know for sure is at least three people saw them that night.
content.summary: 5 orange orbs southern sky

content.detailedDescription: My sister witnessed this and sent the photos to me seems im more into ufo phenomonon ive veiwed the pitcures and dont know what to make of them i cant see them being explaind as any type of craft ive ever seen she said the lights just danced around by the moon for a while so she got her camera and drove to the woods for less light polution and took the photos id like to know what you think i have more pics to
content.summary: Ufo saugatuck mi

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were driving home from my grandmother's house just before 9:00 pm sunday sept. 27, 2009 when i noticed something in the air travelling on a nearly parallel couse with us in the general direction of "11 o'clock".  i asked my mom (who was driving the car) to look at it.  we both noticed lights (yellowish-white in color) that appeared to be flashing in a rotating pattern around the object (which was dark and hard to see;but appeared to be blimp or disk shaped).  for a moment, all of the lights lit up at once in a 'solid' belt around the object. the lights began flashing again as the object continued its slow course.  this pattern repeated about every three seconds or so.  i estimate it happened about ten times; maybe more... the object continued to move along the i-17 corridor at low altitude (about the same or lower than some helicopter traffic i've seen in the area).  the object appeared to be very slow compared to an any aircraft i've seen around this area as well. we continued our trip home and also continued to watch the object.  upon arriving home, i went in my house to get my dad and a pair of binoculars; but when we went outside the object was gone.  i had a hard time understanding how something moving so slow could disappear that fast.  my dad and i scanned the sky for a few minutes; but didn't see anything else unusual.  we decided to report the incident; but think it may be possible that the object was a 'blimp'.  my mom disagrees and thinks it wasn't a blimp; but says she doesn't have any explanation for what it could be.  my dad did not see the object.
content.summary: Blimp/disk with rotating lights low altitude southbound above i-17 at bell rd

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside throwing the football around by myself. about 10 minutes later i notice a star like object next to a mountain. i watched for awhile as it slowly moved to the west getting dimmer and dimmer. i know its not a plane because theyre was a plane about as far out as the object that i could see blinking the ufo wasn't blinking. i watched it slowly about 45 seconds before it dissapeared behind the treeline i ran inside to get a camera. after 3o seconds i ran out back out side without the camera(couldn't find it) and it was gone. my brother had ran out with me but it was gone. i think it might have got so far away it wasn't visible or it disspeared under the treeline. during the event everything was completely silent.
1. i was outside throwing my football to myself.
2. i noticed the object as i was throwing the football around.
3. i thought it was a star or planet.
4. it was a bright white light that slowly moved to the west getting dimmer and dimmer.
5. my feelings were what the heck is this, and i'd better get a camera, and afterwards i was disspaointed it was gone.
6. i lost sight because it either got so dim it wasn't vivsible anymore or it dissapeared behind the treeline.
content.summary: Ball of light, slowly moving to the west getting dimmer and dimmer.

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i where camping in our yard in chesaning. we were both about 12 years old. he noticed a glowing object floating in our neigbors yard. it was about midnite. it moved slowly across the yard at about 5 feet off the ground. he was frightened as hell. i immediately got up and walked towards it. he told me to stay away from it but i was compelled to see it. the light came from behind the neighbors house and floated over the yard and it lit up the side of the house as well as the ground below it. i came with in 30 feet of it. the light was quite brilliant, not a beam like a flashlite. it was shaped like a geodesic dome and looked like highly polished chrome or some type of polished glass or gem. it floated in a straight path and didnt move up or down. as i approached it made a slight pop sound like a bubble popped and disappeared. ironically we where just a feet from the spot where i saw the blue phosflourescent light in the sky a few years earlier.
content.summary: Moving glowing light

content.detailedDescription: I was very young at the time, 8 or 9 years old. it was summer time just after dusk. i was playing outside when i saw a phosflourescent blue light moving slowly north to south in the sky. it was silent, moving very slowly. i could see the farm house image about a half mile away to the west. it was about half the distance to the farm house and slightly above. i was mesmerized, just staring at it for about 4-5 minutes. it suddenly stopped and stayed in one position. an older neighbor came up to me and asked me what i was doing. all i could think of that could move thru the sky and then stop and stay motionless was a helicoptor. i pointed to the blue light and told him it was a helicoptor. he said it was a star. i was distracted and when i looked up it was gone. even at 8-9 years old i knew that it wasnt a helicoptor. since that day i have been extremely observent, open minded and investigative of phenomena.
content.summary: Phosflourescence blue round object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I went to my backyard to take my dogs outside and was looking at the sky when i noticed a very bright starlike light coming toward the house.  at first i thought it may be a small plane, but realized it was silent and there were no flashing lights on it.  as it got closer i ran into the house and got my husband to go out to the front yard to look and see what i was seeing.  we both watched it quietly go over the house traveling slower than a jet would but faster than a small plane would go.  it slowly got smaller as it traveled away from us and then it suddently disappeared either into a cloud (slightly hazy night) or it blinked out.  the entire event probably took about 5 minutes.  it may have been about 1500 feet in the sky.  we have skywatching equipment and watch the skies as often as we can, but really didnt have enough time to get out the night vision monoculars.  we both are mufon investigators and feel we were watching a ufo.  other than unusual lights and shapes using our night vision equipment my husband has never seen a ufo real and upclose.  i have seen 4 other sightings in the past and each time they did things that i felt wasnt a part of our technology.
content.summary: Bright light going going northwest to southeast single bright light, no sound

content.detailedDescription: For the past 4 nights, i have seen these star-like objects in the night, they come out anywhere from 9pm-1am. there are some that reappear in the same places as the previous night, but each night there are more. when i say same places, i mean that it predominantly where they are, but one thing is for sure. they move in u shaped and figure 8 turns, and some even stobe into blue, or red. i have been trying my hardest to find an explanation, but i'm still mystified. i even called the police out, and they have no explanation. lockheed martin is not even a half hour away, and they test special aircraft designed for the military. i sure would appreciate any thoughts on this, as it has been a big question for me.
content.summary: Bright lights that zig-zag and move in circles, slowly.

content.detailedDescription: i was walking to the little store about 2 blocks away from my house this evening. now i am constantly looking up at the sky because of a previous non reported sighting. i figured this time i would report it. so i normally walk down the alley to this store..As i was walking i looked up to the east sky and saw a very bright star. this was just a regular star but below it..More to the left..I saw another star falling slowly down. i have seen many shooting stars and this was no shooting star. it moved very slowly , i had to stop for a few seconds to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me. it was still moving directly down then suddenly disappeared. i am sure this was a unidentified flying object,i wasn't too terrible shocked because this isn't the first time i've seen one. my previous experience was well unexplainable really..For that i have witnesses this time i was alone.This sighting lasted about a minute.
content.summary: Very odd

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my car when i saw five circle objects cross the mission bay coming from the west in low altitude. there was a bigger one that i could see clearly spinning and blinking different lights!
the other 4 objects were smaller and had one color only! the 5 objects hovered for a little bit on top of the free way, so they started heading south and up in the sky until they complete disappeared really hight in the sky!
content.summary: 5 circular objects one bigger and spinning crossed mission bay and the 5 free way coming from the west in low altitude and headed south and up until they complete disappeared
